column4: anyone know how to partion a 2 TB HDD and have one ex4 and one ntfs
where can i find the gparted live cd?
you booted from the livecd and unmounted the partition?
no i downloaded it from ubuntu software center and installed. I also don't want to loose my data, could i also do it in the disk utility
you cant do it on a working partition you realize
right now my linis-swap is at 25.63 gb
the reason i was making the / a large partions so that in the future i have space when download programs and stuff. or will i be able to extend it later on?
you would have to install every single package to fill that. and you would still have a huge amount of space left
ok i guess i can make it smaller size.
